short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab page to keep you in your flow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension focusing around a new tab page experience.

The new tab centers around columns which you can customize.

Available Columns:
- Notes with markdown support
- Temporary pins (click on extension icon to add/remove on a website)
- Bookmark folder groups (you select which of your bookmark folders are visible using Add Col button on the homepage)
- Recently bookmarked
- Recently closed tabs
- Top Sites (as provided by Chrome)
- Top visited from history
- Top visited from history by domain
- Omni search (top visited, bookmark, history)

Adding a column button allows you to pick some of your bookmark directories for quick shortcuts.

Sync available for notes & temporary tabs.
